name: Space Escape (Konnner)
description:
An attempt at a game is space for the Mini-jam 77. Was way more complex than what I was thinking, so it is uncompleted. There are many problems and bugs as well. There was an attempt at a rope thing so left click shoots a rope that sticks to stuff, but doesn't really work, and right click removes it.

I am done with this project and will not complete or update it, it was just made for this game jam.
